caption: narendramodi.in
message:
On #WorldPoetryDay I congratulate all poets, budding & established for their efforts to popularise this splendid medium of expression. Poetry is at the heart of the oral tradition, giving voice to countless people across the world & bringing out their magnificent creativity.

I have occasionally penned my thoughts through poetry. The book ‘Sakshibhav’ is a collection of some of the works.  http://www.narendramodi.in/ebooks/sakshi-bhaav
